February 4, 1958
Mr. Robert B, Burrows
Assistant Professor of Speech
College of Arts and Sciences
West Virginia University
Morgantown, Vest Virginia
Dear Professor Burrows:
The only fora in which we have the kind of information you recuest in your
letter of January 27 is our TV Research Fact Sheets. These are reports on
research issued periodically, but at irregular intervals and have been
available on a subscription basis at $2.50 per year.
As of January, 1958, the Fact Sheets have been incorporated into our NAEB
Journal and will no longer be issued separately. We do have back copies of
the Fact Sheets and will be happy to send you all those issued in 1956 and
1957 if you care to purchase them for $5*00.
Since the Fact Sheets are now included in our Journal you might be interÂ¬
ested in an Individual membership in the NAEB. The annual dues for such
membership are $7.50 and this entitles you to receive the NAEB Newsletter
and the NAEB Journal. In addition you will be sent the announcements and
other information we send to our members from time to time. I have enclosed
brochures describing the work of the Association and an application formffor
Individual membership in case you are interested in applying.
Sincerely,
Harold E. Hill
Associate Director
